## Key Features Documented

âœ… **Daily Habit Tracking**
- 30-day calendar interface
- Up to 30 daily habits
- Real-time checkbox system

âœ… **Day-Specific Assignment**
- Assign habits to specific days (M/W/F)
- Automatic goal calculation
- Flexible scheduling

âœ… **Automatic Progress Calculation**
- Daily completion tracking
- Weekly progress percentages
- Monthly summary stats
- Top 15 habit ranking

âœ… **Wellness Tracking**
- Sleep hours logger
- Water intake tracker
- Mood emoji system
- Pattern visualizations

âœ… **Extended Planning**
- Weekly habits (up to 15)
- Monthly goals (up to 30)
- Yearly habits (up to 15)
- Task management (up to 15 tasks)

âœ… **Beautiful Visualizations**
- Color-coded habits (30+ colors)
- Progress bars
- Charts and graphs
- Consistency rankings

## Getting Started

### Step 1: Clone or Fork
```bash
git clone https://github.com/iganga360/Easy-Habit-Tracker.git
cd Easy-Habit-Tracker
```

### Step 2: Read Documentation
Start with **README.md** for complete overview.

### Step 3: Choose Your Path
- **New User?** â†’ Follow SETUP_GUIDE.md
- **Want Ideas?** â†’ Check HABIT_IDEAS.md
- **Need Details?** â†’ Read FEATURES.md
- **Visual Learner?** â†’ See VISUAL_GUIDE.md

### Step 4: Access the Template
- Get the Google Sheets template (link in README)
- Make a copy to your Google Drive
- Customize with your habits
- Start tracking!

## Documentation Highlights

### README.md (7,500+ words)
- Complete feature list
- What's included in each tab
- Why it's different
- Quick start guide (5 minutes)
- Pro tips & best practices
- Support information

### PROJECT_OVERVIEW.md (10,800+ words)
- Quick navigation guide
- 5-minute quick start
- Feature breakdown by tab
- Day-specific tracking explained
- Customization options
- Common mistakes to avoid
- Troubleshooting

### FEATURES.md (7,600+ words)
- Deep dive into each feature
- Daily tracking mechanics
- Progress calculation details
- Self-check zone breakdown
- Data privacy & security
- Performance statistics

### SETUP_GUIDE.md (9,600+ words)
- 5-minute setup walkthrough
- Popular habit suggestions
- Day-specific tutorial
- Custom goal mode guide
- Self-check zone setup
- Monthly reset process
- Mobile tips
- Troubleshooting

### HABIT_IDEAS.md (11,500+ words)
- 100+ habit ideas
- Organized by category:
  - Health & Fitness (15+)
  - Learning & Productivity (15+)
  - Home & Organization (20+)
  - Work & Finance (10+)
  - Personal Growth (10+)
  - Social & Relationships (10+)
  - Hobbies & Creativity (10+)
- 6 complete starter templates
- Building bigger habit chains

### VISUAL_GUIDE.md (19,700+ words)
- Complete system flowchart
- Daily tracking flow
- Day-specific assignment diagram
- Progress visualization
- Consistency ranking chart
- Wellness tracking visuals
- Tab structure overview
- Color palette guide
- Monthly reset process
- User journey map
- Quick reference card

### TRACKER_DATA_TEMPLATE.json
- Complete JSON data structure
- Sample habit data
- Weekly progress data
- Monthly summary format
- Wellness tracking structure
- Statistics and insights
- Real-world example values

## Technology Stack

- **Platform**: Google Sheets (Cloud-based)
- **Storage**: Google Drive
- **Format**: Spreadsheet + Documentation
- **Documentation**: Markdown
- **Data**: JSON (template)
- **Access**: Web-based
- **Compatibility**: All devices (phone, tablet, desktop)
